Name: in the forest
Description: This is the far corner of a dark forest. Scary sounds come from every direction.

Name: in the forest
Description: Towards the south, you see a gate that gives access to a dark place.

Name: in the forest
Description: There is a muddy smell coming from the east.

Name: in the swamp
Description: A creepy mist hangs over the smelly surface.

Name: in the forest
Description: There is a muddy smell coming from the west.

Name: in the forest
Description: Mind the low-hanging branches!

Name: at the cemetery
Description: The smell of rotting flesh creeps up your nose. You think you see a tombstone move.

Name: in the swamp
Description: A creepy mist hangs over the smelly surface.

Name: at an open space
Description: There is a muddy smell coming from the west.

Name: in the forest
Description: You almost step into a bear trap.

Name: at an open space
Description: Through the mist you can just make out the outline of the dark forest.

Name: on the swamp path
Description: There's a skeleton here, probably one of your predecessors.

Name: at an open space
Description: In the light of a half moon you can just make out the shape of a gallow.

Name: in the forest
Description: In the distance you hear the sad howl of a werewolf.

Name: at an open space
Description: There's a dead rabbit on the ground that's being attacked by flies.

Name: in the swamp
Description: A creepy mist hangs over the smelly surface.

Name: in the ruins
Description: The ruins are a spooky rubble. There is a shaky staircase that leads downwards.

Name: in the slime cave
Description: The walls of the cave are covered in a snotty slime.

Name: in the black cave
Description: You can't see your hand in front of your face.

Name: in the horny cave
Description: Affixed to the wall are yellow, torn Playboy posters.

Name: in the straitjacket cave
Description: There's a straitjacket hanging from the ceiling, with a mutilated body in it.

Name: in the main cave
Description: There is a battery of mysterious equipment, here.

Name: in the hieroglyphs cave
Description: There are symbols on the walls that you can not make sense of.

Name: in the stench cave
Description: The filthy stench that lingers here reminds you of the heavy smell of a cesspool.

Name: in the fluorescent cave
Description: The cave is weakly lit by a light source that hangs high at the ceiling.

Name: in the ice cave
Description: In this cave everything looks like it is made out of ice. It gives you the shivers.

Name: in the cactus cave
Description: You're surrounded by poisonous cactuses that are present in this cave.

Name: in the stalagmite cave
Description: You see a railing of stalagmites.

Name: in the storm cave
Description: A hard wind blows through this cave that makes you hold on to one of the walls.

Name: in a stairwell cave
Description: There is a large, circular stairwell that is made out of stone. It looks like it leads to other levels.

Name: in the tentacle cave
Description: Large tentacles come from all directions. They scan your body and leave green traces on your skin.

Name: in the garbage cave
Description: There is large pile of rotting food remains in this cave. The stench is almost unbearable.

Name: in the echo cave
Description: All sounds you make echo back from the walls.

Name: in the secret cave
Description: On the floor of the cave there's a wide range of unfamiliar and mysterious objects.

Name: in the food cave
Description: It smells like this probably was a kitchen at some point...

Name: in the cave of the gnu
Description: Scattered around are skeletons of creatures that fell prey to the gnu before.

Name: in the eye cave
Description: From all angles you are looked at by red, blood-shot eyes that precisely follow your actions.

Name: in the rock cave
Description: You see sharp rock edges everywhere. Brown crusts are attached to some of them.

Name: at the sandbank
Description: On the ground you see strange patterns, made out of different types of sand.

Name: in the torture cave
Description: Under the vague shimmer of the torture fires, you can just see a thumbscrew and some pointy objects that still have some blood attached to them.

Name: in the safe cave
Description: This is the only cave in which you feel some safety.

Name: in the narrow cleft
Description: You're surrounded by high rock walls at all sides. You only see an opening at the western side.

Name: in the oil cave
Description: An enormous heat spreads from the south that is only just bearable in this cave.

Name: in a stairwell cave
Description: There is a large, circular stairwell that is made out of stone. It looks like it leads to other levels.

Name: in the spider cave
Description: It's teeming with tarantulas, here. You hear crunching with every step you take, and you feel them crawling up your legs.

Name: in the scooby cave
Description: Weird noises come from all directions, as if in a mental institution.

Name: in the radioactive cave
Description: Due to the high level of radioactivity, this cave is dimly lit.

Name: in the a cave
Description: This caves houses the stone statue of an old creature that is unfamiliar to you.

Name: in the cave of death
Description: The name of this cave speaks for itself...

Name: in a stairwell cave
Description: There is a large, circular stairwell that is made out of stone. It looks like it leads to other levels.

Name: in the damnation cave
Description: An almost suffocating atmosphere dominates this cave. You don't feel comfortable here.

Name: in the neon cave
Description: This cave is brightly coloured. There are patterns that remind you of black magic.

Name: in the blood cave
Description: There's a skeleton of a large beast on the ground, and some of its guts are next to it.

Name: in the bat cave
Description: Bats are fluttering everywhere in this cave, looking for their prey.

Name: in the snake cave
Description: You hear the sound of a rattle-snake. At the northern end there's a drawing of a skull, signifying danger.

Name: in the slippery cave
Description: You nearly slip over the soap-like goo that is everywhere in this cave. Somewhere in the slippery mass, a pole sticks up that has an arrow attached to it, which points east.
